name: Drop The Adventure
description:
Drop The Adventure

Guide Drop through the castle,  gatter as many gems as possible and defeat the monsters that haunt the land!

Use your guide line to align your movement and set the proper power guage to throw Drop around the stages.

There are 20 stages in total. Look for the key to open the gate to the next stage. In the last stage you'll need to defeat all the enemies in order to finish the game.

This game was made for the Lost Cartridge Jam

Controls

Toggle full screen - F12

Close game - ESC

Set power guage - Up or Down (analog, digital pad or keys)

Set direction -  Left or Right (analog, digital pad or keys)

Throw Drop - "X" key or A/Y in the Gamepad

Break speed - "Z" key or B/X in the Gamepad

Start Button - Enter Key

Credits

Music by Eric Skiff

Game by Amir Bayareh
